name: UILargeContentViewerItem
desc: Methods that provide details about how to display your custom content in the large content viewer.

items.name: var showsLargeContentViewer: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether or not to show the item in the large content viewer.

items.name: var largeContentTitle: String?
items.desc: A string that describes an item to display in the large content viewer.

items.name: var largeContentImage: UIImage?
items.desc: An image that represents an item to display in the large content viewer.

items.name: var largeContentImageInsets: UIEdgeInsets
items.desc: Insets to adjust the position of the item’s image so it appears visually centered in the large content viewer.

items.name: var scalesLargeContentImage: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the view scales the item’s image to a larger size or not.
